name: google-lighthouse-custom-audit-master
description: Custom performance audit with Lighthouse and User Timing API. We test how fast our product page (cloned Amazon product page) hero image is loading. Read my tutorial : https://www.aymen-loukil.com/en/blog-en/google-lighthouse-custom-audits/ # Run lighthouse --config-path=custom-config.js https://yourURL or the url of the hosted file.
